channel.title: Psychology on Anthropocene Timeline
channel.description: Recent content in Psychology on Anthropocene Timeline

item.title: Don't even think about it
item.description: A psychological approach to the question : why don’t we care about climate change ?

item.title: Merchants of Doubt
item.description: How a Handful of Scientists Obscured the Truth on Issues from Tobacco Smoke to Global Warming.

item.title: The Psychology of Climate Change Communication
item.description: A great psychological guide for anybody interested in enhancing its communication skills about climate change and more.

item.title: This Changes Everything
item.description: This is a must-read in order to understand the systemic causes and consequences in the Anthropocene.

item.title: Two Degrees
item.description: Another book on the climate change subject: it does not provide more information if you are already informed. It nonetheless offers a different point of view about it.

item.title: Why Climat Change does not Scare Us Yet ?
item.description: A psychological approach to answer the question : Why Climate Change does not scare us yet ?
